feed.title: Where to post information about new protocol releases?

entry.title: Where to post information about new protocol releases?
entry.summary:
The use of announcement tags in the context of software releases within the implementation category has been highlighted as a current practice. However, for protocol improvements, it's suggested that crafting a post similar to what one would present at a conference might be more effective than merely making an announcement. This approach emphasizes the importance of tailoring content presentation to its subject matter to enhance its impact and relevance.
Additionally, there's guidance provided on the flexibility of posting locations. Contributors are encouraged to post in the area they deem most suitable initially, with the understanding that the post can be moved to a more appropriate section if necessary. This is facilitated by flagging posts as "off-topic" to suggest a relocation, distinguishing from "spam" flags which indicate content that is unsuitable for the site in its entirety. This system underscores the community's role in organizing content effectively and ensuring information is presented in the most relevant context.
